First, I went by myself at around 15:00 and the place was pretty empty.  Tried to sit at a table but was told I had to sit at the bar (even though only two tables were being used).  Usually I would just leave at that point but since all the reviews were so great I figured I'd stick it out once.Had the oxtail, octopus and calamari.  The main reason I went to this place were the reviews and pictures of the calamari, I love stuffed calamari.  However what the reviews don't mention is that the "stuffing" is just a kind of sweet paste.  Not really my thing.  Oxtail was nice and tender as mentioned but also on the sweet side.  Octopus was ok.The service was not very good, no one offered to help me with the menu (I only speak English) so I had to use my translation app as best as I could.   Plus starting out with being told to sit at the bar isn't going to help the whole "experience".Basically another miss brought to you by Yelp.
